special_abilities.name: Poor Depth Perception.
descriptions: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 ft. away.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The cyclops makes two greatclub attacks.

actions.name: Greatclub.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
